channel.title: Mystery of why this wont work :D
channel.description:
This is what came up on my screen when i tried to run my source.
Loaded WorldMap In (719 ms)... Demise PK'ing has been activated... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2131) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:559) at server.main(server.java:124)
now...this the file that has the npc spawn, autospawn.cfg
//Shops + Makeover Mage spawn = 599 3098 3499 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2790 3086 3501 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2633 3097 3499 0 0 0 0 0 1 //Guide spawn = 945 3084 3486 0 0 0 0 0 1 //KBD spawn = 50 2275 4696 0 0 0 0 0 1 //Pest Control spawn = 3788 2660 2648 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 3789 2662 2648 0 0 0 0 0 1 //Chaos Elemental spawn = 3200 3108 3691 0 0 0 0 0 1 //19284994 spirit beast spawn = 5 1928 5000 0 0 0 0 0 1 //jad spawn = 2745 2102 4428 0 0 0 0 0 1 //verac spawn = 2030 2525 4657 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2030 2528 4655 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2030 2526 4653 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2030 2523 4653 0 0 0 0 0 1 //Dharok spawn = 2026 2533 4655 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2026 2536 4654 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2026 2533 4652 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2026 2535 4651 0 0 0 0 0 1 //Ahrim spawn = 2025 2516 4646 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2025 2519 4645 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2025 2518 4643 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2025 2515 4643 0 0 0 0 0 1 //torag spawn = 2029 2526 4638 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2029 2524 4637 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2029 2523 4639 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2029 2526 4640 0 0 0 0 0 1 //karil spawn = 2028 2518 4636 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2028 2515 4636 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2028 2517 4635 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2028 2516 4637 0 0 0 0 0 1 //guthan spawn = 2027 2519 4646 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2027 2522 4646 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2027 2522 4644 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2027 2520 4643 0 0 0 0 0 1 [ENDOFSPAWNLIST]
and this is the file that has the npc drops, npcdrops.cfg
//ahrim npcdrop = 2025 4708 1 50 npcdrop = 2025 4710 1 50 npcdrop = 2025 4712 1 50 npcdrop = 2025 4714 1 50 npcdrop = 2025 2530 1 100 //dharok npcdrop = 2026 4716 1 50 npcdrop = 2026 4718 1 50 npcdrop = 2026 4720 1 50 npcdrop = 2026 4722 1 50 npcdrop = 2026 2530 1 100 //guthan npcdrop = 2027 4724 1 50 npcdrop = 2027 4726 1 50 npcdrop = 2027 4728 1 50 npcdrop = 2027 4730 1 50 npcdrop = 2027 2530 1 100 //karil npcdrop = 2028 4732 1 50 npcdrop = 2028 4734 1 50 npcdrop = 2028 4736 1 50 npcdrop = 2028 4738 1 50 npcdrop = 2028 4740 1000 90 npcdrop = 2028 4740 10000 40 npcdrop = 2028 4740 4000 65 npcdrop = 2028 4740 200000 10 npcdrop = 2028 2530 1 100 //torag npcdrop = 2029 4745 1 50 npcdrop = 2029 4747 1 50 npcdrop = 2029 4749 1 50 npcdrop = 2029 4751 1 50 npcdrop = 2029 2530 1 100 //verac npcdrop = 2030 4753 1 50 npcdrop = 2030 4755 1 50 npcdrop = 2030 4757 1 50 npcdrop = 2030 4759 1 50 npcdrop = 2025 2530 1 100 //jad npcdrop = 2745 16512 2 100 npcdrop = 2745 1042 2 100 npcdrop = 2745 1048 2 100 npcdrop = 2745 1046 2 100 npcdrop = 2745 1044 2 100 npcdrop = 2745 1040 2 100 npcdrop = 2745 1038 2 100 npcdrop = 2745 1055 2 100 npcdrop = 2745 1057 2 100 npcdrop = 2745 1053 2 100 npcdrop = 2745 1050 2 100 //spirit beast npcdrop = 5 16512 1 10 npcdrop = 5 1042 1 10 npcdrop = 5 1048 1 10 npcdrop = 5 1046 1 10 npcdrop = 5 1044 1 10 npcdrop = 5 1040 1 10 npcdrop = 5 1038 1 10 npcdrop = 5 1055 1 10 npcdrop = 5 1057 1 10 npcdrop = 5 1053 1 10 npcdrop = 5 1050 1 10 npcdrop = 5 1052 1 90 npcdrop = 5 13000 1 50 npcdrop = 5 13001 1 50 npcdrop = 5 13002 1 50 npcdrop = 5 13003 1 50
i was told that this is a problem with tab/spacing, so if you can solve it i would be happy. it could be anywhere but i was asked by another person to upload this info. if you need anything else let me know. thanks

item.title: Mystery of why this wont work :D
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

i0wn3v3ry:

This has to do with the amount of drops per npc… In your NPCHANDLER, search something like… 3841 [45] or something like that, and change to around 150 - allowing 50 drops per npc.

ill give it a try. ill modify the message after a little while, make sure to check back

EDIT!! You sir, are a fucking genius.

Read full topic
item.source: Mystery of why this wont work :D
